name: Slingshot Explorer: The Twelve Towers
description: Old school platformer. Difficult, very difficult, but very fun and challenging. Only for platformmaniacs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or superior Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller Xinput/Directinput8 and keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB (with Pixel Shader support) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller Xinput/Directinput8 and keyboard
